title: DJ Sessions: Kansas' 'Retro Cocktail Hour'
teaser: "Space age pop" and "incredibly strange music" are the songs of the day on this installment of the DJ Sessions.
contentencoded:
In this week’s installment of the DJ Sessions, Darrell Brogdon, who hosts the “Retro Cocktail Hour” at Kansas Public Radio, joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson with his picks, which he describes as “space age pop” and “incredibly strange music.”

  • Hear more Here & Now DJ Sessions

Music from the Segment

  • Les Baxter, “Simba”
  • Red Callender Sextet, “Voodoo”
  • Creepxotica, “Bali Hai Bossa”
  • Stolen Idols, “On Tonga Shores”
  • Harmonie Ensemble/New York, “Peter Gunn Theme”
  • Ixtahuele, “Colors of Hawaitiki”

Guest

  • Darrell Brogdon, host of KPR’s “Retro Cocktail Hour.” He tweets @kprbrogdon.
